General.Name: Beijing Emerging Eastern Aviation Equipment Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Beijing Emerging Eastern Aviation Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and servicing of aviation equipment products with intelligent control technology. The company offers airborne equipment, which includes airborne suspension/launch device; aircraft information management and recording system products, such as video information detection, collection, processing, compression, recording, and display products; and transmission equipment products, including airborne video processing systems and video recorders. Its products are used in aviation equipment fields, such as helicopters, fixed-wing aircraft, and drones. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
